website_summaries.verdict: The zippers on these smell-proof bags keep scents and freshness inside. Don't expect to get more than 1 or 2 uses out of each bag, though.
pros: Multi-packs available in an assortment of sizes
cons: If you touch the bag's contents and then touch the outside of the bag, it may transfer the smell
Won't get more than a couple uses from a single bag

customer_reviews.title: Did what they were meant to do. Didn't attract ...
customer_reviews.text: Did what they were meant to do. Didn't attract any unwanted attention in a certain X- Ray. I flattened out the herb inside the bag, purse or as much excess air as i could, then after closing the plastic zip lock, used an iron to perma-seal the top of the bag for extra measure.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Mayhall

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, I received a batch of 25 bags with a manufacturing problem and none of them sealed properly.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle R.

customer_reviews.title: Ok for single-use, seal detached from bag wall after opening/closing more than once.
customer_reviews.text: These are just ok. I found that if you plan to open and close the bag more than twice, the seal will detach from the wall of the bag, rendering it useless and the contents open to the air to be smelled. I ended up having to double bag just to avoid an emergency situation, and the second (new) bag's seal was slightly detached as well. Between the two bags, the product could still be smelled if you knew what you were looking (smelling) for.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Worked for me
customer_reviews.text: I put some herb in a baggie, then into the smell proof bag. I placed it in my car so it would sit closed up for a while. We all know how smells can be amplified and hit you right in the face after something sits in the car for a bit. Well, an hour later when I opened my car door I could not smell a thing, and this was some strong smelling stuff. I will purchase again, but may go up a size.
customer_reviews.author: Jill Rae

customer_reviews.title: Success!
customer_reviews.text: Already made a shipment using these bags....went thru the system undetected.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Noseblind
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for my use, obviously don't touch the things you're putting in and then touch the bag, it'll defeat the purpose. Either use gloves or tweezers to place what ever you need to put in these bags. They work.
customer_reviews.author: J.Narushima

customer_reviews.title: These are an absolutely wonderful product. I've tried them under a variety of ...
customer_reviews.text: These are an absolutely wonderful product. I've tried them under a variety of conditions and they have always lived up to their claim. This is the 2nd time I've purchased these and I will be back to buy some more when needed. I can't recommend these enough.......No smell period! Also I love the fact that you can heat seal these containers:)
customer_reviews.author: Lab gal

customer_reviews.title: They concealed what they needed to conceal
customer_reviews.text: Used with our “smellproof” bag to pre-pack our small “fragrant” items. I was very careful NOT to get anything on the outsides of the bags before closing them. I wish there was no logo on them that resembled a “leaf!” I didn’t rip them open, so I could re-use them at a later date. The items made it onto the cruise ship in my carry-on bag, and made it off the ship in my carry-on bag without a problem.
customer_reviews.author: slklutz

customer_reviews.title: I Won’t Travel Without These!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely loved this product. Several pouches come in the order. Each pouch holds a surprisely large amount. Very durable product. By far my favorite product. I felt 100% safe traveling using these pouches by themselves.
customer_reviews.author: S.L.

customer_reviews.title: Seal breaks VERY easily!
customer_reviews.text: Although, these bags have a super cool look, as well as design to them, there is one major flaw, that seals the negative review in for me. The ziplock part breaks very easily. I was only able to open then two to three times each before they came apart and needed to be thrown away. This effectively and very easily, makes them more than quadruple the price of others that are there same price. I definitely won't be buying this brand anymore.
customer_reviews.author: The Woodworker

customer_reviews.title: Great for catnip if you have a demon cat like ...
customer_reviews.text: Hot Tip: Great for catnip if you have a demon cat like us who will scale bookshelfs just to get some of the good stuff.
customer_reviews.author: DovahGiggles

customer_reviews.title: Don’t get
customer_reviews.text: Alright I think I know why some people would want this (smirky face). But don’t waste your time some of them ripped. I’ll say the ones that didn’t ripe couldn’t handle the strong scent of “candy” for long. So just get a vacuumed seal glass jar and if you want to hide the content inside than just wrap it. Oh if you want to know where it ripes. On the opening so it’s of no use.
customer_reviews.author: Sergio

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: I love these bags! If you are a smoker and roll mad blunts they can hold a good 5-6 blunts at a time and it’s more discreet but still looks sick! Some ziplock zippers on them do mess up and rip off so just be careful with them and they will stay smell proof!
customer_reviews.author: Kurt

customer_reviews.title: Edit: Well... I thought these were good...
customer_reviews.text: I really want to love these bags but the pinch and seal enclosure keeps ripping off of the bag (as shown in picture) which is extremely disappointing and frustrating given that I spent good money on these and I'm very careful when opening them to begin with. Will contact the company for some sort of compensation as these were not cheap
customer_reviews.author: Kappie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Storage!
customer_reviews.text: The scent proof bags arrived quickly and packaged well. They are made of quality material and seal securely. They concealed the scent completely, no scent detected at all. Perfect for sharing, traveling, or just basic storage. I definitely recommend this product & plan to reorder in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Brandy Milford

customer_reviews.title: Smell proof yes; but serious issues with Ziploc getting Unglued from one side
customer_reviews.text: Update: These are proving to be one time use only. The glue comes off when trying to open the bag and then it's useless :-( I like the product. It's definitely smell/odor proof. But the glue for the Ziploc closing mechanism keeps coming off for me. I have to be very careful with opening these, and try to hold the Ziploc edge down. Else the Ziploc part comes unglued from one side and the bag is then completely useless :-(
customer_reviews.author: Singh

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price, you can get 100 bags that size for $7 from China
customer_reviews.text: Mylar, black on black. $25 bucks for 25 small poor quality bags
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Honest review.
customer_reviews.text: The bag is okay, the size is 4×6. Inside is 3.5x4.5 . It doesn't expand from the bottom where you can put it up standing. The scent doesn't smell around the room but when you sniff it from the bag you will smell some. Above all, good for the price and quality it too versus the other smell proof bags I would definitely pick this for the price and quantity.
customer_reviews.author: Mharvin M.

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than expected size
customer_reviews.text: Get a size bigger than what you expect to receive
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Houseman

customer_reviews.title: Not smell proof
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for a backpacking trip as I had great luck last year with smell proof weed bags in keeping critters out of my stuff.. so much so that even my fatty pitbull hasn’t bitten those. However, these were IMMEDIATELY scoped out by the raccoons and they ate all our food and... yah.. not good when your 10 miles from your car and then 60 miles from civilization
customer_reviews.author: Heather Armstrong

customer_reviews.title: Durable, but weak seal
customer_reviews.text: The bags work great after the first sealing. Very durable on the outside. However, the part that binds the deal with the bag is extremely weak. I could only get two to three openings before the seal would separate from the bag rendering it useless.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Discrete is key!
customer_reviews.text: These things are actually quite effective! I was truly impressed!
customer_reviews.author: rebecca t

customer_reviews.title: Seal breaks easily.
customer_reviews.text: Awful. They work only once because the seal in place is poorly constructed. It peels away from the bag wall very easily. Not great for smell proof either. Strongly suggest to find another brand. This one sucks.
customer_reviews.author: Angel Baggett

customer_reviews.title: I would love to see this product upgraded to something better however ...
customer_reviews.text: the opening for the bags is to big that if you however get any dust on it or it touchs any of your product, it will contaminate it and the smell proof reason becomes of no more. sure you can cut some of it off however that's not always the case since the zip can still leak out out of 25 bags I found 8 to be defaulted, I would love to see this product upgraded to something better however its not something I would seek anytime soon.
customer_reviews.author: ksm

customer_reviews.title: Poorly glued
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for obvious reasons and they are not very durable. If you are going to open them often, the zip track will come unglued from the bag. This has happened to me three separate times. Disappointed to say the least.
customer_reviews.author: Brian W.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed after all the reviews about these bags, however this was not my experience. I tested the bags by filling them with air and slowly the bags deflated, so the bags I received aren’t smell proof.
customer_reviews.author: Felicia Brown

customer_reviews.title: Works at first but smell leaks out over time.
customer_reviews.text: I used these for camping to put different spices in for premade spices for camp meals. They were great for adding a small amount of spice, are very light, and take up very little room. On initial use they work great. But after two to three days 7 of the bags I used no longer could contain the smell. My backpack smelled like garlic and chili powder. I didn't open and reseal them. So I don't know if they can be reused and still keep the smell in or they get worse.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for herb
customer_reviews.text: Works great, no smell. The package is discreet and you can't see through it. Keeps herbs very fresh. The zip lock tends to wear out after some use though.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn D. Smith

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!!
customer_reviews.text: Used these for some 420 products (legal where I am) and it totally knocked out the smell and keeps the 420 products from making my car or room smell. These are awesome!
customer_reviews.author: JoelMG

customer_reviews.title: Not Discreet
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Not discreet at all with the weed flower on it.
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: Descretion
customer_reviews.text: These are always a go to buy for me when it comes to smoking descretely. They are cheap and you get your money's worth with them. After a while the seal breaks but there are many bags in a pack. Also, don't put bowls or pipes in them that are sharp, they puncture the bags very easily. Overall thumbs up!
customer_reviews.author: Kenn

customer_reviews.title: Food or other smelly items in there do not seem ...
customer_reviews.text: Food or other smelly items in there do not seem to smell. You can heat seal them with an iron. Works for me.
customer_reviews.author: officialmarc

customer_reviews.title: Good but not great
customer_reviews.text: A few of these the ziplock part came unglued from the bag. The bags have large borders that take up a lot of the useable space.
customer_reviews.author: Andy T Blood

customer_reviews.title: Good for most people
customer_reviews.text: Definitely keeps my joints safe. Can't say it's K-9 safe but it's definitely parent safe. That's all I need it for since I live in Wa
customer_reviews.author: Cody

customer_reviews.title: closure
customer_reviews.text: the nylon zipper has broken on three bags already and now i'm trying to be very gentle the bag has a cool graphic on it and it does its job
customer_reviews.author: Leonard M.

customer_reviews.title: Great bags. Good for discreet storage
customer_reviews.text: Very handy for pipe storage, keeps smells in and discreet. Would recommend, and will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: nicholas reisinger

customer_reviews.title: The last thing this bag is is “smell proof”. ...
customer_reviews.text: The last thing this bag is is “smell proof”. My medical canabis smells just as strong in a regular sandwich bag. These guys just used regular zip tight bags and are passing it off as smell proof. Try one of the other hundred brands out there before these
customer_reviews.author: Ctexx

customer_reviews.title: Can't smell through these
customer_reviews.text: I put in the smelliest herbs I have and couldn't smell it through the bag. You can even seal it with a hair straightener so you can travel without as much anxiety.
customer_reviews.author: R. Emery

customer_reviews.title: Garbage product
customer_reviews.text: I would have went with NO STARS if it were available. I tried to use 3 different bags and each one tore being use. The zip top sucks
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Live the bags!
customer_reviews.text: These are wonderful. They do exactly what we were hoping for! We will continue to purchase this brand. Their strong they hold up and no ordor gets out of them! I would recommend these smell bags! The’re grate!
customer_reviews.author: Dean Hanke

customer_reviews.title: These bags work well if you get pulled over
customer_reviews.text: Plain and simple. The smell proof bags work like a charm. I was a little judgmental about the texture of the item at 1st. Turns out I'm just an idiot. I can assure you that I'm satisfied with my purchase. No BS
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: They work well, protect odor, but they’re essentially a one time use product. For some reason, once you open the seal, it will never let you close it back up. Otherwise super discreet!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A little smaller than I thought
customer_reviews.text: I like these I've been using them for little hiking meals they seal well and hold about a cup of whatever you want plus they can be reused
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdiness needs to be improved 8.8/10
customer_reviews.text: For the price I got them I’m not surprise a couple of them rip after some time of use, overall they work as intended and the small size helps me to save my Stiiizy pods so they dont smell in my back pack.
customer_reviews.author: Francisco Medrano

customer_reviews.title: Nice Little Bags
customer_reviews.text: They are smell proof, however not very durable, after just 3 or 4 times opening them the seal seperates from the bag.
customer_reviews.author: Oldredbeard

customer_reviews.title: Break easily
customer_reviews.text: I received this 15-pack of bags two days ago, and three of the bags have already broken. They’re definitely not sturdy, and I would not purchase them again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Makes even the most vile smells, disappear.
customer_reviews.text: I have been in the ICU for 5 months from drinking Conway PA water.. I have done all sorts of things inside these bags and I promise you, not a single smell left its presence.
customer_reviews.author: Hux

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I really like your product!! The only issue I have had is the Ziploc style closure does come unglued from one side after a few times of opening and closing so it's not a sure thing if you're traveling around visiting several friends. I've just tried to be gentler.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: All my friends like this product the seal is easy to break on the other hand. Well worth purchases they really work great.
customer_reviews.author: Croghan SMIB

customer_reviews.title: Stinky
customer_reviews.text: On each bag the zip lock strip came apart from the bag. No longer smell proof. Too bad.
customer_reviews.author: karolyn

customer_reviews.title: Deal is not right on bag
customer_reviews.text: I have been using these bags and had no problems. But, the last 6 that I went to use, I had sealed them and then when I tried to pull the seal apart, the plastics zipper seal pulled away from the bag. Therefore they are not usable.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: They are pretty good bags. If you have to constantly open them pull the bag from the zipper just in case. They fit a pound and a 67g bodiva. They do keep the smell down. But when heat sealed they are smell proof. Bags are tough and havent had a stem poke through yet. Great for long term storage. Hope this helps.
customer_reviews.author: john c.

customer_reviews.title: Just be gentle when you open them and you should be fine.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve bought these twice. They definitely keep the smell in as long as the ziploc isn’t broken. Bags open / re open about 50 times before they start having issues. Just be gentle when you open them and you should be fine.
customer_reviews.author: Dakota K.

customer_reviews.title: Solid bag
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was expecting. Not sure how smell proof it is but the bag is decently thick so I’m sure it works just fine.
customer_reviews.author: James Caserta

customer_reviews.title: Not Bad Product
customer_reviews.text: It works good, just a little scent. I would recommend keeping it at a small compartment!
customer_reviews.author: Pusha Man

customer_reviews.title: Not happy
customer_reviews.text: No happy, when you open them the seams tear away from the side..
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Not really smellproof!
customer_reviews.text: I do not find these to be smell proof at all. If you have product that does not have a strong scent, then maybe. I cannot figure out why so many people say they work, but they don't work for me.
customer_reviews.author: Jo Jo B

customer_reviews.title: Smell a bit
customer_reviews.text: Food still smelling. Maybe because it mainly is baked or boiled fish
customer_reviews.author: Marvel_the_Great

customer_reviews.title: Great Bags!
customer_reviews.text: These bags are great! However, I have had some difficulty in sealing them/ keeping them sealed. I especially like the compact and discreet size
customer_reviews.author: James Sovereign

customer_reviews.title: Very Good!
customer_reviews.text: I got them as gifts for a bunch of co workers and they have exclaimed about it! They love it and say it works great, Would buy again and in different sizes.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: The bags were great but the 4x6 was a bit bigger than I ...
customer_reviews.text: The bags were great but the 4x6 was a bit bigger than I thought. They were about the length of a ps3 controller. Still great and still found use for them. Overall I would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Edward Rasta

customer_reviews.title: Job well done!
customer_reviews.text: Thick and sturdy. Great for keeping dried garden herbs fresh! Completely smell proof too! I also like that I can use a black sharpie for labeling. They are also flexible! They can be easily placed into and be removed from mason jars for storage. They can be heat sealed too.
customer_reviews.author: Netta Bolser

customer_reviews.title: Nice and works pretty good
customer_reviews.text: Nice and works pretty good. Not 100% smell proof around the seal tho.. At least Not for this true LOUD pack I tested it with..
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: These do not work
customer_reviews.text: Go with the original Smelly Proof brand. These do not work at all.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander Sideris

customer_reviews.title: Good but one weird design feature?
customer_reviews.text: Good, definitely cannot smell even the strongest of scents through the bag. Kind of confused by the placement of the part you tear off the top as it doesnt do anything. Other than that, I'm happy with this.
customer_reviews.author: yeetophile

customer_reviews.title: Stand out above the crowd
customer_reviews.text: Good bags. Smell proof to humans, wouldn't test it past a dog. Use a lighter to seal the top, great so customers know if a middle man dipped into the bag. Can stuff a half zip in these things, wouldn't go the whole zip, won't close right. Have bought this item multiple times, and will continue. Makes you "stand out" from the crowd.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Carter

customer_reviews.title: Good company that works
customer_reviews.text: U can use these 2-3 times before they start to go bad
customer_reviews.author: Christian

customer_reviews.title: Bad batch? (3"X4")
customer_reviews.text: 3X4: Quality control needs to step up. After opening twice the zip lock detached, ruining the product. No such problem with larger bags.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian by default

customer_reviews.title: Great bags!
customer_reviews.text: Love these bags. Have bought a bunch of them over the past 2 years. They hold up pretty well. Won’t last forever if you open often though. No smell if heat sealed. As a reference for size if using for herbs: the small is good for 1/4 oz Medium 1 oz and the big one up to a QP
customer_reviews.author: Northerner

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: The bags seal pulled of bag when you go to reopen bag
customer_reviews.author: jjcn

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: These work pretty well... I use them in another Smell-Proof bag for maximum effect.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Love the look of the bag. And very smell proof.
customer_reviews.author: Gizmolina

customer_reviews.title: works well!
customer_reviews.text: Very smell proof bags. Perfect that it comes in many different sizes.
customer_reviews.author: Esther Kim

customer_reviews.title: Hard to open- will tear.
customer_reviews.text: These are good bags for what they do as long as you can open and close them without tearing which is how two of mine became unusable. They are really hard to open and because of this I accidentally tore them.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie crofts

customer_reviews.title: Good could be better .
customer_reviews.text: They work great they do mask odor just might get a whiff if sitting next to you. Bags are good only problem is the seal breaks easily or I got a defective batch,but would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Jean

customer_reviews.title: Glue Breaks Easily
customer_reviews.text: The bag looks cool but compared to other bags, it seems to be made of cheaper material. I've had this for about a week and have gone thru four bags. The seal is extremely strong, which is good, but the glue that holds the seal easily comes off. Would not suggest to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Stuart Stincer

customer_reviews.title: They work as advertised! Nice size as well
customer_reviews.text: 100% Smell Proof. I was a little skeptical at first...but wow...nothing leaks through these bags.
customer_reviews.author: Grant

customer_reviews.title: Built like crap. Don't buy any of their products
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as they looked to do as promised. Nice packaging but the ziplock on EVERY SINGLE BAG broke either upon opening or to re-open after using. To be clear, the definition of "broke": The ziplock material detached from EVERY bag immediately or upon first use thereby making the "seal" completely useless. Tremendous waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: JG3

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced, cheap quality.
customer_reviews.text: These bags are not for long term use I bought them on two separate occasions and the first time I thought that I was handling them too rough why the Ziploc was breaking but on the second order I realized that they're just made really cheap in my opinion they're overpriced.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: These are good!
customer_reviews.text: You'll never know what's inside the bag, aroma-wise ... they are that good!!!
customer_reviews.author: Garvoon

customer_reviews.title: Leaking defeated the purpose
customer_reviews.text: Smells were leaking out of the bag, and overtime the seals came off. And that presented a problem
customer_reviews.author: Edible

customer_reviews.title: Bags Work Great
customer_reviews.text: These worked perfectly. Once it went into the bag I couldn't smell a things.
customer_reviews.author: Matt B.

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty closure as well makes for a bag that in my opinion is the best smell proof bag I’ve tired yet
customer_reviews.text: These bags are a convenient size. Heavy duty closure as well makes for a bag that in my opinion is the best smell proof bag I’ve tired yet. Also these bags can be sealed with an impulse sealer for an added layer of smell protection
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 12x16 too small for a lb.  Still nice bags.
customer_reviews.text: I like the look, they do what is claimed. They would be much better if they were wider at the bottom and self standing. Unless you like to crush your product, these are too small for a full lb. I purchased the 12x16 size.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A+A+A+A+ Seller
customer_reviews.text: Bigger then I thought but they are very good product. I did buy ones that were to small so I bought these to replace the others.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Kenney

customer_reviews.title: No smell. #POG
customer_reviews.text: Love these bags, absolutely no smell comes from the bag!
customer_reviews.author: K. Bales

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Very useful for short term storage. However this product is not 100% smell proof from pets. Otherwise it does it’s job overall. It is somewhat reusable but needs to be replace after a certain usage.
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: a little smaller than I expected but very nice quality and people love them
customer_reviews.author: doberman

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I liked the packaging for transporting the flower without the smell. Plus they are reusable and sturdy. The only drawback is that with larger buds, and joints they may get crushed in your pocket or mishandling.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin W.

customer_reviews.title: These are not smell proof
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking bags, but are not smell proof. Had others confirm this.
customer_reviews.author: M Ram

customer_reviews.title: sub par at best, good for storage though
customer_reviews.text: first time storing herbs in my house and these baggies worked for about 20 minutes. I put the bag of herb inside a glass jar and 2 minutes later the jar smelled like herb completely. it's good for quick transport
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: The zip seal doesn't last long. They are smell proof till the seal breaks
customer_reviews.author: April H

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: I didn't get them for awhile due to mail mix up and kind of forgot about them. Finally tried them with acid test on very sensitive and critical noses. A+ results.
customer_reviews.author: Alan the dentist

customer_reviews.title: Stink proof!!👍👍👍
customer_reviews.text: Not highest grade stink bag..but still works perfectly..in time the seal will wear out after continue open n closing
customer_reviews.author: nathan mosher

customer_reviews.title: One time use?
customer_reviews.text: The two bags that I have used so far sealed up good the first time. The zip lock is very strong and in the process of opening the bag the zipper comes detached from the bag. I don’t know if they need stronger glue or what is needed.
customer_reviews.author: Kimo jose

customer_reviews.title: It works ig
customer_reviews.text: One zipper always manages to rip off the bag and just stays closed and connected to the other zipper basically making the bag useless since it is permanently opened. Otherwise for travel use its good and is a good protect overall till then
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It works for few hours, after that smell comes out.
customer_reviews.author: tobey me

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Would like to label them and figured I could use a silver sharpie.
customer_reviews.author: Queen Kelly

customer_reviews.title: You need to vacuum seal them
customer_reviews.text: The bags were good without being vacuum sealed. Can still smell a little smell through them without the vacuum seal. After vacuum sealing the bag you are unable to smell anything
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Stachowski

customer_reviews.title: HIGHLY recommended
customer_reviews.text: These bags are absolutely worth every penny, they block the smell of even the skunkiest buds without a problem at all, I HIGHLY recommend these, no matter which size you order they are awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Smshocker

product_meta.title: 15 Smell Proof Bags - 8.5x10 Inches by Interplanetary Development
product_meta.description:
Size:8.5x10Interplanetary Development's Heavy Duty Smell Proof Bags! Keep stinky smells locked away with ID's Baggies. Our smell proof baggies are great for storing fish, herbs, and more! Our baggys are made of high quality materials that resists tears and punctures. Our heavy duty zipper provides a strong seal, keeping orders locked inside.
